name: Vegetable Soup With Meat
keywords: beef, veal neck bones, vegetables, main course, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds boneless chuck, cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: In a big soup pot, put the water, bones and meat. Bring to boil. With hands, crush tomatoes into chunks; add to pot. Add onions, celery, potatoes, carrots and broccoli stems. Simmer 1 1/2 hours, occasionally skimming foam off the top.
When nearly done, remove bones from soup, cut meat off the bones and return meat to soup. Discard bones. Just before serving, salt and pepper to taste, and garnish with parsley.
